title: What year did Alchemy start? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alchemy is a mystery but I think it's been around for tens of thousands of years since man what's discovering the Bronze Age pottery and making food and discovering chemical reactions Alchemy has been around a very long time and we're still discovering more and more even now in the 20th century.

That’s the third question I’ve seen of the format “What year did/were ___ invented” The “what year” stands out. It isn’t the way most people would approach the subjects at hand since they are not well suited to it.
